titleStmt.title: A proposal by Dr. Hugh Chamberlain in Essex-Street, for a bank of secure current credit to be founded upon land In order to the general good of landed men. To the great increase of the value of land, and the no less benefit and augmentation of trade and commerce.
titleStmt.author: Chamberlen, Hugh.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by T. Sowle, in White-Hart-Court in Gracious-Street,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in Christ Church College, Oxford.
